text: Ama (waa) sida mugdiyo daran bad weyn salkeed ah, oo hir uu sii daboolo uu korkiisuna hir kale sii yahay, oo ay daruuro sii kor joogaan, (dabaqyo) mugdiyo daran ah midba mid kale kor saaran yahay, marka uu soo saaro gacantiisa uu ku sigan inuu arki waayo! Oo mid kastoo aanu Allaah u yeelin Nuur, ma uu laha Nuur
